alert.note: Alert for Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Northwest Harford; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 11:24AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A PERIOD OF LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN MARYLAND THROUGH MIDDAY... Snow will coat mainly grassy and elevated surfaces through midday, and with temperatures falling to near freezing this may coat untreated paved surfaces as well. Wind gusts around 30 to 40 mph combined with the snow may reduce visibility to near one-half mile at times. Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Columbia, Bowie, Severn, Annapolis, Crofton, Middle River, Elkridge, Aberdeen, Havre De Grace, Mayo, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Baltimore-Washington Airport, South River, Rhode River, Back River, Calvert, Glen Burnie, Dundalk, and Towson. This includes the following highways... Route 1 in Maryland near mile marker 4. Interstate 95 in Maryland between mile markers 34 and 52, and between mile markers 57 and 102. Interstate 97 in Maryland between mile markers 1 and 8. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cecil; Central and Southeast Howard; Northwest Harford; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
